title: Future TV Technology (Wahl TV)
text: By Wahl TV Oct 11, 2015 Wahltv is providing an integrated television system that merges the power and versatility of a computer with the convenience of a TV. It will allow people to watch Live TV worldwide on all electronic devices through the internet. No longer will live content be restricted geographically. Instead of using traditional satellite in space and other equipment to bring live content to peoples' homes; Wahltv's finished state-of-the-art software and hardware will accomplish the same with a fraction of the cost by using the power of the internet.From the past 50 years, the price of cable has incrementally increased significantly while premium contents have gone down drastically. For the last 35 years satellite have done the same. People now are paying way more for less. Currently, the live content industry is a natural monopoly. Due to the live content distribution requirements, only a few competitors can exist in most cable market. Often there is only one option that consumers can choose. And also when people relocate whether it be to another country or continent chances are their service providers cannot provide service. Consequently, people will have to enter into a new agreements.Other live tv service systems including software that previously existed are too constrain and unreliable during bad weather. People cannot take their cable or satellite service to a different country. Wahltv is completly different, all you have to do is enter the wifi information on your system and resume where you left off all under 5 minutes. Because our signal is broadcast over the internet, no natural or unnatural disasters can disrupt the signal as long as a person is connected to the internet.Wahltv software provide the convenience of Live TV worldwide, phone, and computer over the internet.All we need is your support in letting everyone know about our project. With your support we will be able to not just have a working prototype. But a product that will be available to everyone.For Further Details Please Visit http://kck.st/1Leh09W4733 W Atlantic Ave, Delray Beach, Florida 33445 About the Author
